Tarun Sachdeva

Nov 19, 2018

Post REST

An interesting article on the future of REST - the standard used by almost all web and mobile applications for data transfer. I remember having this discussion when I worked at Amazon in the early 2000s - when the early version of Amazon web services supported REST and SOAP. Now the discussion is back with the introduction of GraphQL - a new querying language and data transmission standard develop led and open sourced by Facebook (along with React, Relay and other JS based frameworks).


About

My name is Tarun Sachdeva. I use this space to write everyday - to clarify my thoughts, learn through writing, and sometimes just journal and post things I find interesting.
